anas elghafari wrote:
> I am running Heritrix 1.14.3 and JVM 1.6. Anyway, thank you for the tip, 
> I found where the problem is: Basically Writer processor that I wrote as 
> a test goes into an infinite loop with 0.01 probability (I wrote that to 
> test the effects of a writer  that tries talking to an Indexer that has 
> crashed).

Happy to hear you found the problem.

> It would be nice is to be able to pause the crawl job from within a 
> Writer. CrawlJobHandler has the pauseJob() method. Is there a way for a 
> processor to access the CrawlJobHandler?

Take a look at the LowDiskPauseProcessor for an example -- modules 
inside "the crawl" should send such requests through the 
CrawlController. (The CrawlJobHandler is an operator-UI-related class 
that shouldn't be of interest to crawl implementation classes.)

Hope this helps,

- Gordon @ IA
